Package oh_hecc.game_parts.component_editing_windows

Class MetadataEditorWindow

java.lang.Object
oh_hecc.game_parts.component_editing_windows.GenericEditorWindow
oh_hecc.game_parts.component_editing_windows.MetadataEditorWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
EditorWindowInterface
public class MetadataEditorWindow
extends GenericEditorWindow
Basically this class is a dialog window to be used for editing EditableMetadata objects (or, well, MetadataEditingInterface instances. same thing though)

    • makeSureTitleIsValid

      private void makeSureTitleIsValid()
      Ensures that the title input text in titleInput is valid It does this by seeing if it satisfies the SharedMetadata.VALID_TITLE_REGEX regex If it's valid, the text will be black. Otherwise, it'll be red.

    • makeSureAuthorIsValid

      private void makeSureAuthorIsValid()
      Ensures that the author input text is valid It does this by seeing if it satisfies the SharedMetadata.VALID_AUTHOR_REGEX regex. If it's valid, the text will be black. Otherwise, it'll be red.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
